column1: Happy New Year and decade! They hold a lot of promise and I’m excited about what we can achieve in 2020 + thankful for so many blessings. It’s an honor to serve the people of Arkansas and I will continue to work hard and to the best of my ability to do just that. #arpx #ARgop https://t.co/sDohibumYe

Hoping you and your loved ones have had a Merry Christmas. Remember the reason for this season. We're so very blessed and Christmas is another reminder of that truth. The gifts of family faith and freedom are at the top of my list. https://t.co/xmbWMFp17o

Gratitude is central to #Thanksgiving.  RT if you're #thankful for: - living in the freest most prosperous country in the world - men and women risking their lives to defend and protect us - incredible blessings from God like faith family and friendship.  #HappyThanksgiving https://t.co/tAJReJXnhj

Great be with a packed house @GOPBentonCounty 2019 Reagan Day Dinner and though she needs no introduction talk about my friend @SarahHuckabee. A wonderful night with many faithful conservatives and happy warriors. Always enjoy getting to spend time with this group. #ARpx #ARGOP https://t.co/Cla5iSuAbH

Happy #VeteransDay to the heroes who answered the call to serve. I’m continually amazed & humbled by those who have worn America’s uniform. They feel honored to have sacrificed and served the country we all love. What a testament to our military and our our nation. THANK YOU 🇺🇸 https://t.co/Cf2pSKWwrJ
@realWillTeeter @JohnBoozman Game’s changed quite a bit since the last time I suited up so I don’t think I’m the guy but I appreciate the vote of confidence! https://t.co/ZQecFap0kU
Happy Birthday to the few the proud the United States #Marines. 244 years and going of service and honor. Semper Fi and God Bless our Marine Corps. https://t.co/NUmxptFQ7O

Congratulations to Arkansas’s own Dave and @marrs_jenny Marrs on the premiere of their show. They’re a great family and deserve this type of success. Great to see them giving the rest of the country a look at some of the qualities that make life in NWA & our entire state so good. https://t.co/5s2luyvwVr

Dorothy’s decades working to build and grow @ARGOP played a vital role in our civic life and demonstrated how to make a difference: get involved & work on behalf of your beliefs. Her legacy of faith patriotism leadership and advocacy will live on in Mississippi Co. & across AR https://t.co/ACybEjZWxa

9-11-01 serves as a reminder that our security & way of life can be threatened at any moment - with tragic consequences. But it also taught us to rely on the bonds that unite us to find comfort and courage. We will #neverforget the lives lost and forever changed that day. #Sept11

Great way to start the college football season and @razorbackfb game day. Brandon’s story is still an inspiration and his incredible legacy lives on. #Burlsworth #TheBurlsWay @Burlsworth_Fdn @BurlsworthTrust @CollegeGameDay #WPS https://t.co/U4qFXACShl

Congratulations to these young Arkansans who have stepped forward to lead. Their important work to energize & inspire their peers will help make sure @ARGOP is able to support conservatives up and down the ballot in 2020. I look forwarding to working with @ARYR this cycle. #arpx https://t.co/t3J1pHlxeZ

Two Democratic presidential candidates have visited Arkansas in the last few days but no amount of campaign rhetoric can change or distort the facts. Our state is moving in the right direction - from the economy to education and more - under conservative leadership. #arpx @ARGOP

Great to be with so many @ARGOP faithful in Little Rock today to offer my support for @TomCottonAR as he officially kicks off his campaign for US Senate. Tom is a friend whose talent and expertise on critical issues benefit Arkansas & our country tremendously. 🇺🇸 #ARpx #ARGOP https://t.co/jSt4YhEMFu

Sad to learn of the passing of @BooneCoARGOP Chairman Joe Maxey. I’m praying for and sending my sincere condolences to his loved ones and all those feeling the impact of his loss. Appreciate all his efforts on behalf of the @ARGOP our state and nation.

Be sure to contact @ARGOP to volunteer this cycle and help elect #conservatives to offices up and down the ballot. That can only happen when we work together and get involved. Don’t be left out! 🐘🔴🇺🇸 #arpx   https://t.co/AM1okC1j6h https://t.co/aoOPzKBJLX

Congratulations on this well-deserved accomplishment Tim. Service to country runs deep in your blood so I know how special this must be for you and your family. Looking forward to recognizing and celebrating this promotion with you soon 🇺🇸 #arpx https://t.co/HRlcHdZCZE

Happy Birthday #America! It’s our nation’s 243rd birthday and there’s a lot to celebrate.  We’re grateful to live in the greatest country on earth known the world over as the land of the free and home of the brave with liberty and justice for all.  #July4th #USA #IndependenceDay https://t.co/sUBTnXOvBq

Congratulations on this exciting news @alicetweet. The students and campus culture at Harvard’s @Kennedy_School will be better for having your voice and insights as part of the conversation. Good luck and we’ll still see you on @CNN.  https://t.co/PpLSYF6DZs

Be sure to follow @SarahHuckabee and connect with her on Facebook and Instagram too. She’s headed back home and I know she’s anxious to spend time with her family and reflect on the journey she’s been on. I’m so happy for Sarah and know she’s got a bright future ahead. https://t.co/3TyQnPQ9kA
Happy #FathersDay to the dads in our lives. Their footsteps and examples help guide and teach us. Thankful for the gift of fatherhood. https://t.co/5JHTJF9VA9

Happy Birthday @realDonaldTrump. May the Lord bless you with many more years of health and strength. Joining lots of Americans in wishing you a very wonderful birthday celebration. https://t.co/NFq7wIPYrW

“That so many Americans have given up their lives on the battlefield is something we should never take for granted. I remain in awe of their heroism and service.”  Read this @TimesRecord editorial for more of my #MemorialDay thoughts and reflections.  https://t.co/LFO8YhWNnp

Spend this #MemorialDay Weekend doing what you love & what helps you appreciate the freedom we’ve been blessed with. But remember those who laid down their lives to secure & protect it🇺🇸  “Greater love has no one than this that one lay down his life for his friends.” -John 15:13
Wishing moms in Arkansas and everywhere a happy #MothersDay2019 https://t.co/naxaQSHRBA

My annual Fish Fry was yesterday and we had a great evening eating delicious food & enjoying a time of fellowship and good entertainment. I’m blessed to have so many supporters and friends I can always rely on for encouraging words & reminders about what’s really important. #ARpx https://t.co/omvl9kqyBP
Joining Christians around Arkansas and the world in celebrating the #resurrection of Christ. Have a blessed #Easter #ResurrectionSunday https://t.co/Piji93aMXi

Always a pleasure to join the Arkansas Federation of Republican Women. Folks like them help mobilize our grassroots in support of conservative Arkansas values. We appreciate everything they do and will continue relying on their leadership and advocacy. @ARGOP #arpx https://t.co/tl4PjcIPGc

The #GreenNewDeal is a left-wing socialist takeover which I voted to reject. Arkansans don’t need to be taxed & regulated into oblivion to pay for its trillions in costs and new mandates. More big government is not the answer — in fact it’s the problem.  https://t.co/Q5Ut94WytT

Incredibly disappointed in this outcome. We owe babies who survive abortion the same care & treatment any other newborn would receive. Anything less is a tragedy and a stain on our character. America is better than this & I have faith that respect for all human life will prevail. https://t.co/0AzNs7po33

Great to have a friend and colleague like @SenatorTimScott in Arkansas. He’s someone I really admire who is always trying to bring people together and find solutions that move America forward. We appreciate his bold conservative voice. @votetimscott @ARGOP 🇺🇸 #ARGOP #arpx https://t.co/MMIxpDqXUt

Congratulations to my friend and a great public servant @LtGovTimGriffin on being selected to head @the_RLGA. Tim’s a natural leader who will do an excellent job as chairman and represent AR well. GOP Lt. Governors will benefit from his work & example.  https://t.co/CpfmG0pl68
